name: Ghost Detective: Part 1
description:
Casey the Ghost Detective is on the case! Find clues, avoid rude ghosts, and help solve Casey's biggest case yet! Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad Summer Slow Jams. 

  • Theme: Music First
  • Creative Theme: Ghost Notes

Credits:

  • Coding: Jordan Laurent
  • Music: Makenna Bach
  • Art:Amanda Rivera
  • Ideas:  Qristy Overton and the rest of the team 

Controls:

Use the arrow keys or WASD to navigate around the scene and find clues!

SPACE will make you invincible, but only for a short time - use it wisely.
